info.title: RAD5 Communication Tool API
info.description: A real-time communication platform API supporting messaging, channels, file sharing, video/audio calls, polls, and user management. Includes WebSocket support for real-time events via Socket.IO.

tags.name: Users
tags.description: User management, profile, privacy, notifications, and avatar endpoints

tags.name: Messages
tags.description: Messaging, reactions, polls, file upload, and message status endpoints

post.description: Register a new user with name, email, and password.
Authenticate user with email and password
Sends a 6-digit OTP code to the user's email for password reset. The OTP expires in 15 minutes. Also sends a link-based reset email as fallback. Always returns success to prevent email enumeration.

200.description: OTP sent (or silent success if email not found)

message.example: If an account exists, a password reset email has been sent

post.description: Verify the 6-digit OTP sent to the user's email during password reset. Returns a reset token on success.

resetToken.description: Token to use for resetting the password

400.description: Invalid or missing input, or expired OTP

post.description: Resend a new 6-digit OTP to the user's email. Always returns success to prevent email enumeration.

200.description: OTP resent (or silent success if email not found)

message.example: If an account exists, a new OTP has been sent

post.description: Reset user's password using the token received from OTP verification or the email link.

400.description: Invalid or expired token, or weak password

post.description: Change the current user's password. Requires the current password for verification.

400.description: Missing fields or weak new password

get.description: Returns a paginated list of all users. Supports search by name.
Returns the authenticated user's full profile including unread message count

put.description: Update user's name, bio, and/or avatar image (multipart form data)
Update user's privacy preferences: lastSeen visibility, profile visibility, read receipts, and typing indicators

Update notification preferences. All fields are optional — omitted fields retain their current values. Supports granular control over messages, groups, sounds, audio, images, videos, files, reactions, mentions, and calls.
Upload a new avatar image for the current user. Accepts multipart form data with an image file.

avatar.description: Image file to use as avatar
Cloudinary URL of the uploaded avatar

delete.description: Remove the current user's avatar image

get.description: Returns a specific user's avatar URL along with their ID and name
Returns all group channels that the current user is a member of. Includes unread count, last message, and membership info. DMs are no longer returned here — use /dms instead.

post.description: Create a new group channel. The creator is automatically added as admin.

get.description: Get or create a personal (DM) chat with the specified user

parameters.name: recipientId
parameters.description: The ID of the other user

post.description: Get or create a personal (DM) chat with the specified user

get.description: Get paginated messages from a personal chat

post.description: Send a message in a personal chat. Creates the personal chat if it doesn't exist. Supports text, file attachments, audio, and polls.

audio.description: JSON string with url and duration for voice notes

poll.description: JSON string with options array for polls

delete.description: Soft-deletes all messages sent by the current user in this personal chat. Sets text/attachments/audio/poll to null and marks as deleted.

message.example: Your messages in this chat have been cleared

post.description: Toggle the archived status of a personal chat for the current user
Toggle the starred status of a personal chat
Toggle the muted status of a personal chat

patch.description: Update multiple settings (archive, star, mute) for a personal chat at once

get.description: Get detailed information about a channel including members, media, and attachments

403.description: Not a member of this channel

delete.description: Permanently delete a group channel and all its data (messages, reactions, memberships). Only group admins can delete. Cannot delete personal chats this way.

400.description: Cannot delete a personal chat this way

403.description: Only admins can delete a group

post.description: Add a user as a member of the channel. Only admins can add members.

userId.description: ID of the user to add

delete.description: Remove a user from the channel. Only admins can remove members.

parameters.name: memberId
parameters.description: User ID of the member to remove

post.description: Leave a group channel. Cannot leave personal chats. If the user is the only admin, the next oldest member is promoted to admin before the user leaves.

403.description: Not a member of this channel

post.description: Toggle the archived status of a channel for the current user. This is a soft archive — the channel and its data are preserved.
Toggle the starred status of a channel
Toggle the muted status of a channel
Mark all messages in the channel as read for the current user

patch.description: Update multiple channel settings (archive, star, mute) at once

delete.description: Soft-deletes all messages sent by the current user in this channel. Sets text/attachments/audio/poll to null and marks as deleted. Also resets lastReadAt.

message.example: Your messages in this channel have been cleared

403.description: Not a member of this channel

get.description: Get paginated messages from a channel. Includes sender info, reactions, attachments, audio, polls, and message status.

403.description: Not a member of this channel

post.description: Send a message to a channel. Supports text, file attachments, audio/voice notes, and polls via multipart form data.

400.description: Message must have text, file, audio, or poll content

403.description: Not a member of this channel

put.description: Edit the text of a message. Only the message sender can edit.

403.description: Can only edit your own messages

delete.description: Soft-delete a message. Only the message sender can delete.

403.description: Can only delete your own messages

post.description: Add a reaction to a message or remove it if the same reaction already exists (toggle behavior)
Vote on a poll option in a message. Removes any previous vote by the user (single-vote polls). The option must be one of the poll's defined options.

400.description: Invalid option or message has no poll

403.description: Not a member of this channel

patch.description: Update the delivery/read status of a message. Only the recipient (not the sender) can update the status. Setting 'read' also sets deliveredAt if not already set.

400.description: Invalid status or cannot update own message

403.description: Not a member of this channel

post.description: Upload a single file to Cloudinary. Returns the file URL and metadata.

get.description: Returns all direct message conversations the current user is part of. Supports search by participant name and filtering.
Returns the DM conversation with the specified user, creating one if it doesn't exist.

parameters.name: recipientId
parameters.description: User ID of the DM recipient

post.description: Creates a DM conversation with the specified user (same as GET, but uses POST).

get.description: Returns paginated messages from a DM conversation.

post.description: Send a direct message to a user. Creates the DM conversation if it doesn't exist.

delete.description: Soft-deletes all messages you sent in this DM.

post.description: Toggle the archive status of a DM conversation.
Toggle the starred status of a DM conversation.
Toggle the muted status of a DM conversation.
Mark all messages in a DM as read.

patch.description: Update archive, star, and mute settings for a DM conversation.

password.description: Must contain uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character

token.description: Reset token received from OTP verification or email link

newPassword.description: Must contain uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character
Must contain uppercase, lowercase, number, and special character

option.description: The poll option to vote for (must match one of the poll's options exactly)

status.description: The new status for the message

avatar.description: Cloudinary URL of the user's avatar image

unread.description: Total unread message count across all channels (only returned for current user)

NotificationSettings.description: Granular notification preferences. All fields are optional when updating — omitted fields retain current values.

reactions.description: Receive notifications for reactions to your messages

role.description: Current user's role in the channel

isArchived.description: Whether the channel is archived for the current user

isStarred.description: Whether the channel is starred for the current user

isMuted.description: Whether notifications are muted for the current user

unreadCount.description: Number of unread messages in the channel

media.description: URLs of media files shared in the channel

memberIds.description: User IDs to add as members

isOwn.description: Whether the message was sent by the current user

deliveredAt.description: Timestamp when the message was delivered

readAt.description: Timestamp when the message was read
